document: {"blocks":[{"key":"485pg","text":"1. Staining, image acquisition, and analysis of synaptic density were performed as described previously with slight adjustments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dbcl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ie4i","text":"2. Synaptic staining was performed in coronal sections (30 μm thick) containing the ACC and MOp from WT and LRRK2 G2019Ski/kimice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":120,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dre8j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78t2g","text":"3. To label pre and postsynaptic proteins, the following antibody combinations were used: VGluT1 and PSD95 (excitatory, intracortical), VGAT, and GEPHYRIN (inhibitory). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fo0a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1btse","text":"4. High magnification 60× objective plus 1.64x optical zoom z-stack images containing 15 optical sections spaced 0.34 μm apart were obtained using an Olympus FV 3000 inverted confocal microscope. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejp8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rjfi","text":"5. Each z-stack was converted into 5 maximum projection images (MPI), each corresponding to a 1 μm section of z plane, by using FIJI. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9823s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhjsg","text":"6. Synapses were identified by the colocalization of pre and postsynaptic puncta. The number of co-localized synaptic puncta of excitatory intracortical (VGluT1/PSD95) and inhibitory (VGAT/GEPHYRIN) synapses were obtained using the FIJI plugin Puncta Analyzer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajn9d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qvoi","text":"7. 15 MPIs were analyzed for each mouse (5 MPI/tissue section, 3 tissue sections/mouse). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53iim","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ikfb","text":"8. Between 4 and 5, age and sex-matched mice/genotype/condition were analyzed for each synaptic staining combination, as indicated in the figure legends. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5cb2u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rve","text":"9. All animals appeared healthy at the time of collection. No data were excluded.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mouse synapse imaging and analysis
